Class Config

java.lang.Object
com.github.cowwoc.docker.resource.Config
public final class Config extends Object
Non-sensitive configuration that is stored in the swarm.

  • Method Details

    • getById

      public static Config getById(DockerClient client, String id) throws IOException, TimeoutException, InterruptedException
      Looks up a config by its ID.
      Parameters:
      client - the client configuration
      id - the config's ID
      Returns:
      null if no match is found
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the arguments are null
      IllegalArgumentException - if id contains leading or trailing whitespace or is empty
      IllegalStateException - if:
      • the client is closed.
      • the server is not part of a swarm.
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.

      Creates a new config.
      Parameters:

      name - the name of the config
      value - the value of the config
      Returns:
      the new Config
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the arguments are null
      IllegalArgumentException - if name contains leading or trailing whitespace or is empty
      IllegalStateException - if:
      • the client is closed.
      • the server is not part of a swarm.
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.

    • getAll

      public List<Config> getAll(DockerClient client) throws IOException, TimeoutException, InterruptedException
      Returns all the configs.
      Parameters:
      client - the client configuration
      Returns:
      an empty list if no match is found
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the arguments are null
      IllegalStateException - if:
      • the client is closed.
      • the server is not part of a swarm.
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.
